description: a(n)-th prime is the smallest prime containing exactly n 0's.
links: Andrew R. Booker, The Nth Prime Page
mathematica: (* see A037053 for f *) PrimePi[ Table[ z[n], {n, 1, 12}]]
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Jan 04 1999.
extensions: Edited and extended by _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 04 2003
